ComicInfo.Summary:
Kulan Gath's return is no good for anyone who digs being alive. His trap for the deadliest warriors in the Marvel Universe is sprung, and if humanity is to survive, the Savage Avengers must slay a god. Elektra tries to corral Conan, Voodoo and Logan into an effective fighting force, and the Punisher desperately searches for his disinterred family. Plus: Conan hefts a deadly new Savage Sword!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------|---------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | David Finch & Frank D'Armata | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Simone Bianchi & Simone Peruzzi | 2 | | Var | Carnage-ized Variant Cover | Leinil Francis Yu & Sunny Gho | 3 |
ComicInfo.Tags: Sickle Priest,Venom,Marrow God,Punisher,The Hand,Elektra,Conan,Doctor Voodoo,Kulan Gath,Savage Avengers,Wolverine
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Three: Crom Whispers
